ai-tika-s0402t13:1_1: Fourth: I have the first place (of the happening) and the dispensations of the teaching and the belonging to himself. It is the position of his own continuity and belonging to the community.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_2: For the world’s gains without gaining material things.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_3: it is so called because he lives in a blade of grass, as forst, launches, and because of the drain and postsing of material things and bearing them with an avarice and for the purpose of crossing over, the way is called “stairs”.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_4: Here is the conclusion of material things in this way: “Inclusion of the Saṅgha I live in material pleasures!”
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_5: When the parents knew that the king’s mother was also able to give the thief and take it to a robber.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_6: having given to the kings, thieves and rulers both the monkeys, and the others have no bad.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_7: When he hasn’t given attention to the ground, he should sit down on the ground.
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_8: The training rule on the Monastic Law in the Collection
ai-tika-s0402t13:1_9: Homages of the Teaching, the Pāṭaligāma, the Suttas, and the collection of the Dhamma.
ai-tika-s0402t13:2_0: On the second, third, and fourth.
